FuncDef:
The role command configures the NE role for IFIT.
The undo role command restores the default NE role for IFIT. The role command configures the NE role for IFIT. The undo role command restores the default NE role for IFIT. By default, an IFIT NE is configured as a transit node. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Ingress and egress nodes deployed on the same server.
-

ExtraInfo: Before configuring IFIT, you can run this command to configure an NE role. If the role is set to ingress-egress, the IFIT header is removed from the traffic on all egress ports of the device. If the role is set to transit, the IFIT header is retained on all egress ports of the device.
